conclusion: The problem involves an ideal gas changing states as indicated by arrows in a figure.
The graph shows pressure (p) on the vertical axis and volume (V) on the horizontal axis with points A, B, C, and D.
Segment BC is a hyperbola with vertical and horizontal axes as asymptotes.
Temperature at state A is given as 300K.
Since the process from A to B is isothermal, the temperature at B is the same as at A.
The temperature at state B is 300K.
